flavor: "The Red Room trained me to do terrible things. I use those skills to safeguard others now."
name: Winter Soldier
text: Lethal Protector — Response: After you attack and defeat an enemy, remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Bucky Barnes
text: Cybernetically Enhanced — Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → search your deck and discard pile for Cybernetic Arm and put it into play. (Shuffle.)

flavor: "Bucky was a skilled fighter before the arm. With it, he's downright scary." —Steve Rogers
name: Cybernetic Arm
text: Resource: Exhaust Cybernetic Arm → generate a [wild] resource for an [[Attack]] event. That event deals 1 additional damage.

name: Black Widow
text: Response: After you play Black Widow from your hand, return an [[Attack]] event from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Arm Block
text: Hero Interrupt (attack/defense): When an enemy attacks, deal 3 damage to it. If you exhausted Cybernetic Arm to pay for this event, prevent all damage from that enemy's attack.

name: Metal Punch
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to en enemy. If you exhausted Cybernetic Arm to pay for this event, this attack gains overkill.

flavor: "They'd be just as shocked if you showed them your high school photo." —Black Widow
name: Electrical Discharge
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this event using a [energy] resource, stun that enemy.

flavor: "You'll never guess who moved in next door." —Bucky Barnes
name: Safe House #30
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Safe House #30 → search the encounter deck for a minion and put it into play engaged with you. (Shuffle.) Then, draw 1 card.

name: Silent Infiltration
text: Hero Response: After you attack and defeat an enemy, discard this card → ready your hero and confuse an enemy.

flavor: "The arm may be bulletproof, but the rest of me is still flesh and blood." —Winter Soldier
name: Winter Armor
text: You get +3 hit points and gain steady.

name: Winter Mask
text: You gain the [[Spy]] trait. Hero Response: After you attack and defeat an enemy, exhaust Winter Mask → draw 1 card.

name: Winter Rifle
text: Restricted. Hero Interrupt: When Winter Soldier makes a basic attack, exhaust Winter Rifle → Winter Soldier gets +2 ATK for this attack. This attack gains piercing and ranged.

name: Captain America
text: Toughness. Response: After Captain America enters play, ready a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] character.

flavor: "My body is infused with high-tech, mind-controlled weaponry."
name: Deathlok
text: Response: After Deathlok enters play, search your deck and discard pile for a copy of S.H.I.E.L.D. Sidearm and attach it to him. (Shuffle.)

name: Firepower
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust up to 3 [[Weapon]] upgrades you control → for each weapon upgrade exhausted this way, choose an enemy and deal 3 damage to it. This attack gains ranged.

name: Spoiling for a Fight
text: Hero Action: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Put that minion into play engaged with you → ready your hero.

name: Aggressive Stance
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After you engage a minion, discard this card → search your deck for an [[Attack]] event and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Bambino
text: Attach to a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] character. While attached to an identity, this card gains restricted. Uses (3 ammo counters). Interrupt: When attached character makes a basic attack, remove 1 ammo counter from here → this attack deals 3 additional damage and gains overkill.

name: Man on the Wall
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Soldier]] trait. Hero Action: Exhaust Man on the Wall → reduce the cost of the next card you play this phase by 1 for each minion engaged with you.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Sidearm
text: Attach to a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] character. Limit 1 per character. Uses (3 ammo counters). Interrupt: When attached character makes a basic attack, exhaust S.H.I.E.L.D. Sidearm and remove 1 ammo counter from it → deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Super-Soldiers
text: Team-Up (Captain America and Winter Soldier). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. Give Captain America and Winter Soldier each a tough status card.

name: Winter, Widow, Soldier, Spy
text: Team-Up (Black Widow and Winter Soldier). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Put a [[Preparation]] upgrade from your discard pile into play. Deal 4 damage to an enemy.

name: White Widow
text: Response: After you resolve the ability of a [[Preparation]] card you control, heal damage from White Widow equal to that card's printed resource cost.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Deputy
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait.
Attach to a friendly character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait.
